bibl.title: Channels of Imperishable Fire. The Beginnings of Christian Mystical Poetry and Dioscorus of Aphrodito. Foreword by J.H.W.G. LIEBESCHUETZ. (Lang Classical Studies. 7.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. The Beginnings of Christian Mystical Allegory in Greek and Latin Poetry. - 2. Dioscorus of Aphrodito: His Archive and a Brief Biography. - 3. An Anacreontic and Chaeretismos [P. Cairo Masp. I, 67097 (= Pack2 348) verso F]: Parody and Allegory? - 4. Elements of Mystical Allegory in Dioscorus' Encomia. - Appendix: Sophronius and Dioscorus. - Bibliography. - General Index.
